mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.username as username ,a.password as password ,a.laoshi_name as laoshiName ,a.laoshi_phone as laoshiPhone ,a.laoshi_id_number as laoshiIdNumber ,a.laoshi_photo as laoshiPhoto ,a.sex_types as sexTypes ,a.laoshi_email as laoshiEmail ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段
FROM laoshi a
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.username like CONCAT('%',#{params.username},'%')
and a.password like CONCAT('%',#{params.password},'%')
and a.laoshi_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.laoshiName},'%')
and a.laoshi_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.laoshiPhone},'%')
and a.laoshi_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.laoshiIdNumber},'%')
and a.sex_types = #{params.sexTypes}
and a.laoshi_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.laoshiEmail},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
